message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for sale. It's a fantastic opportunity to get a high-quality item at a competitive price. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer of $130, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
Hi Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to come down to $135, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $135, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
